name: Tiny Pixel Worlds
description:
- THIS IS NOT THE FINAL PAGE -

I have put the game up now so it would not be drowned out by all the other entries last second

Story:

After humanity has supposedly been destroyed, you are the last known human. Stranded on an unknown planet, you must survive.

Controls:

-WASD/ Arrow keys to move
-E or click the current item to open Inventory
-Left click to place
-Right click to break

Planned Features:

- Multiple planets to explore
- Health
- Tools and weapons
- Different sized planets
